transcripts.text: Privilege hotline, Carol speaking.  What has you made your malfunction, please?
Oh, hi there, yeah.  I'm a white man and I'd like to cash in my privilege, please.  Where do I go to do that?
Extension 254, ask for Todd.  Hello, this is Todd.  Please do not ask for me.
Oh, hi there, yeah.  I'm a white man and I'd like...
Do you have any criminal convictions, unpaid parking fines or child support arrears?
Uh, no, I did say that I'm a white man, but I would like to get all those things too.
You have come to the right place, fellow white man.  I am from North Delhi.
I haven't got a job.  I can't get a loan.  Admittedly, I don't get harassed by the police.
Oh, you're in luck, sir.  We are able to arrange that for you.
Oh, that's brilliant.  Thanks very much.  All I needed to know was where to go.
Speaker's Corner in Hyde Park.  Do you know where that is?
I'm doing the best I can, but it's not easy.  I'm sure you understand.  I'm sure you understand.
Oh, of course, of course, of course.  You can trust me, fellow political prisoner.  I feel trapped in my own head sometimes.  Would you like me to bravely denounce bestiality on your behalf?

That would be brilliant, actually, because I have had all of those things happen before.  Like I said, I can't actually get a loan or a mortgage because every time I do, the bank keeps going on about money.  I keep explaining to them, look, I'm white and male, so I'm entitled to this privilege.  And they say, no, you have to have money.  And I say, well, that doesn't make any sense.  I'm a white man.  I am entitled to that, am I not?
Yes, you are absolutely entitled to that, sir.  Extension 88 is for international tariffs and the GQ.  Would you like me to put you through?
Yeah, I would like that, but I would actually prefer if someone could vouch for some qualifications that I don't have.

Oh, have you been to YouTube, sir?  There's a heaving, bloated swamp of people getting away with that very thing.  It's the answer to all of your prayers.  You can even come to my table if you want.  You know, sometimes it's very difficult being this compassionate.
Now, I guess if you can get a white man to come in and vouch that I could do it, even though I don't have the prerequisite qualifications, that would be wonderful.  I would really appreciate that.

Sir, I can assure you I am entirely qualified to speak for a white man.  I have seen Raiders of the Lost Ark at least five times.  It's a very good movie.  Also, I have played the Atari game of the same name.  Nobody understands the perils of being white better than I do.  I have not been to South Africa recently, but I've been to Poland in the 16th century.  I do not understand what the difference is.  Just give me a goodly chunk of your monthly wages, and I will personally keep the mass murderers from your door with my wokeness.
Ah, that would be perfect, except I can't get a job, because I don't know where to get my white man privilege from.  You can see the vicious circle here.
No, sir, I cannot.  This call is only audio.
But, um, not only that, my last boss was actually a woman.

Oh dear.  Sir, I'm afraid that is an identity fight that you will not win.  Have you tried being gay?  Because you still win, not win with that.  All she has to do is admire another woman's boobies and she will have the same collective victim dollar as a man who at any point in history has been one hastily opened door away from state-mandated execution.  Do you see the dilemma for me there, sir?

I don't know how another white man is going to get my idea through to her a bit more securely, since it was coming from a white man and she wasn't interested.  But more than happy to take your advice on this.
Well, my advice is to stay away from Twitter at all costs.  For all your efforts, you will be the one who is arrested.
Yeah, I've heard some bad things about American cops too, to be honest.  I mean, I'm sure it's just a few bad eggs.
Very nice deflection, sir.  Have you ever been affiliated with Democratic Socialists?  If so, I'm afraid I'm duty-bound to register you as disabled.
Oh, that's fine.  I actually like having my hair played with, so I'm okay with that.

Oh, well, this is very good news.  This is known as her-suty-sexualism and has recently been accepted into the LGBT plus community.  Welcome aboard, sir.  Do remember you can collect extra reward points if you invite three or more foot fascists using the promo code TOTALFUCKINGSHIT4BRAINS.
What about if there were eight or ten?  Would that be okay?
Oh, the more the merrier, sir.  How many of them are white?

Oh, no, no, no, don't worry, don't worry.  I am aware that as a white man I have privilege, and I should just be like those other white men, but I'm actually not, so I'm just trying to get it back.  I must have kept it somewhere.  I mean, you know, these things happen, don't they?

Yes, no, sir, you did not misplace your privilege.  You relinquished it to any ditzy little virago who feels like playing with it and pretending to be brave.  And you will never get it back because they will not give it to you, yes?
Right, so you don't actually accept white male privilege as payment, then?
No, sir.  To repeat, we do not even accept gay male privilege anymore.  Even those daft bastards took any morsel of privilege they ever had and gave it to the aforementioned ditzy little shits, yes?
I may well have called the wrong number.
No, no, no, no, no, sir.  There is no such thing as a wrong number.  But yes, please do not call here ever again.  Goodbye.
